item.title: FairPrice promotes healthier options and takes a stand against diabetes
item.description: NTUC FairPrice (FairPrice) is starting a series of initiatives this year to encourage healthy eating habits and raise awareness about diabetes. The first of these initiatives is a three-month-long 5% discount on all FairPrice housebrand wholegrain rice. Additionally, for the next two weeks, FairPrice will offer the same discount on all 1,000 products across its 133 supermarkets that carry the Healthier Choice Symbol. These discounts are anticipated to save FairPrice shoppers over half a million dollars.
